common_issues.title: PiecesOS Launch Failure
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulties launching PiecesOS on Windows. The error message "Ensure core Dependencies ... (retry setup)" is displayed. Troubleshooting steps include checking for existing issues, ensuring core dependencies are met, and potentially retrying the setup process.

related_issues.title: PiecesOS was unable to launch
related_issues.text:
PiecesOS was unable to launch
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.2.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Ensure core Dependencies ... (retry setup)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8b426c73-aebb-4905-857f-bdee4cad2882)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points Raised:**

* User (@MR-AAYU) is experiencing issues launching PiecesOS.
* The user has reported that PiecesOS won't run.

**Problems Identified:**

* The user is unable to launch PiecesOS.
* The cause of the problem is unclear.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The support bot has automatically triaged and routed the issue to the proper team member.
* The user is advised to expect a follow-up within the next 24 hours.
* The user is provided with links to related issues and helpful resources.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is currently being investigated by the Pieces team.
* No solution has been implemented yet.

**Additional Information:**

* The user might find the following related issues helpful:
    * [PiecesOS was unable to launch.](https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues/627)
    * [Pieces OS won't run](https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues/614)
    * [Ensure core dependencies  Retry Step , I need help #bug](https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues/602)
* The user can also find helpful resources here:
    * Existing Issues: https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues
    * Documentation: https://docs.pieces.app
    * YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@getpieces

recommendations: Investigate the "PiecesOS Launch Failure" issue as a top priority, focusing on the error message "Ensure core Dependencies ... (retry setup)" and its potential causes.
Develop troubleshooting documentation or FAQs specifically addressing the "PiecesOS Launch Failure" issue on Windows.
Consider proactive communication to users regarding the "PiecesOS Launch Failure" issue, such as a notification or announcement.
Review and improve the setup process of PiecesOS, particularly the handling of core dependencies, to prevent similar issues in the future.

Analyze the root cause of the dependency issue and address it to prevent recurrence. This might involve improving dependency management, providing clearer installation instructions, or fixing underlying bugs in PiecesOS or its dependencies.
Monitor the effectiveness of implemented solutions by tracking the number of new tickets related to "PiecesOS Launch Failure" and related issues.

Given the concentration of issues in the "bug", "os:windows", "status:new", "app:desktop application", and "app:pieces os" categories, allocate additional support resources or prioritize issue resolution in these areas.
